annotations.label: Page-header
annotations.text: EN
annotations.translation: 英语

annotations.label: Page-header
annotations.text: Official Journal of the European Union
annotations.translation: 欧盟官方公报

annotations.label: Title
annotations.text: COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 595/2005
annotations.translation: 委员会 (EC) 第 595/2005 号条例

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES,
annotations.translation: 欧洲共同体委员会，

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community,
annotations.translation: 考虑到《建立欧洲共同体条约》，

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Having regard to Council Regulation (EC) No 1784/2003 of 29 September 2003 on the common organisation of the market in cereals (¹),
annotations.translation: 考虑到 2003 年 9 月 29 日关于谷物市场共同组织的理事会 (EC) 第 1784/2003 号条例 (¹)，

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Having regard to Commission Regulation (EC) No 1249/96 of 28 June 1996 laying down detailed rules for the application of Council Regulation (EEC) No 1766/92 as regards import duties in the cereals sector (²), and in particular Article 2 (1) thereof,
annotations.translation: 考虑到委员会 1996 年 6 月 28 日 (EC) 第 1249/96 号条例，其中规定了关于谷物行业 (²) 进口税的理事会 (EEC) 第 1766/92 号条例的适用细则，特别是其中第 2(1) 条，

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (1) Article 10 of Regulation (EC) No 1784/2003 provides that the rates of duty in the Common Customs Tariff are to be charged on import of the products referred to in Article 1 of that Regulation. However, in the case of the products referred to in paragraph 2 of that Article, the import duty is to be equal to the intervention price valid for such products on importation and increased by 55%, minus the cif import price applicable to the consignment in question. However, that duty may not exceed the rate of duty in the Common Customs Tariff.
annotations.translation: (1) (EC) 第 1784/2003 号条例第 10 条规定，进口该条例第 1 条所述产品应按《共同海关税则术语》中的税率征收关税。但是，对于该条第 2 段所述产品，进口关税应等于此类产品在进口时的有效干预价格，并增加 55%，减去适用于所涉托运货物的到岸进口价格。但是，该税率不得超过《共同海关税则术语》中的税率。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: Pursuant to Article 10 (3) of Regulation (EC) No 1784/2003, the cif import prices are calculated on the basis of the representative prices for the product in question on the world market.
annotations.translation: 根据 (EC) 第 1784/2003 号条例第 10(3) 条， 到岸进口价格根据相关产品在国际市场上的代表价格计算。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (3) Regulation (EC) No 1249/96 lays down detailed rules for the application of Regulation (EC) No 1784/2003 as regards import duties in the cereals sector.
annotations.translation: (3) (EC) 第1249/96 号条例规定了适用于谷物行业进口关税的 (EC) 第 1784/2003 号条例的细则。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (4) The import duties are applicable until new duties are fixed and enter into force.
annotations.translation: (4) 进口关税在新关税确定并生效之前一直适用。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (5) In order to allow the import duty system to function normally, the representative market rates recorded during a reference period should be used for calculating the duties.
annotations.translation: (5) 为保障进口关税制度正常运转，应当采用参照期内记录的有代表性的市场税率来计算关税。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (6) Application of Regulation (EC) No 1249/96 results in import duties being fixed as set out in Annex I to this Regulation,
annotations.translation: (6) 适用 (EC) 第 1249/96 号条例导致进口税按本条例附件一的规定确定，

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: HAS ADOPTED THIS REGULATION:
annotations.translation: 已通过以下条例：

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Article 1
annotations.translation: 第 1 条

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: The import duties in the cereals sector referred to in Article 10 (2) of Regulation (EC) No 1784/2003 shall be those fixed in Annex I to this Regulation on the basis of the information given in Annex II.
annotations.translation: (EC) 第 1784/2003 号条例第 10(2) 条所述谷物行业的进口税应为本条例附件一中根据附件二提供的信息所确定的进口税。

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Article 2
annotations.translation: 第 2 条

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: This Regulation shall enter into force on 16 April 2005.
annotations.translation: 本条例将于 2005 年 4 月 16 日起生效。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
annotations.translation: 本条例应具有完整约束力，并直接适用于所有成员国。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Done at Brussels, 15 April 2005.
annotations.translation: 2005 年 4 月 15 日订于布鲁塞尔。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: For the Commission
annotations.translation: 供委员会参考

annotations.label: Footnote
annotations.text: OJ L 161, 29.6.1996, p. 125. Regulation as last amended by Regulation (EC) No 1110/2003 (OJ L 158, 27.6.2003, p. 12).
annotations.translation: OJ L 161，1996 年 6 月 29 日，第 125 页。经 (EC) 第 1110/2003 号条例（OJ L 158，2003 年 6 月 27 日，第 12 页）最后修正的条例。

annotations.label: Title
annotations.text: of 15 April 2005

annotations.label: Title
annotations.text: fixing the import duties in the cereals sector applicable from 16 April 2005
annotations.translation: 确定自 2005 年 4 月 16 日起适用的谷物行业的进口关税

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Whereas :
annotations.translation: 鉴于：

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: J. M. SILVA RODRÍGUEZ
annotations.translation: J·M·席尔瓦·罗德里格斯

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Director-General for Agriculture and Rural Development
annotations.translation: 农业和农村发展总干事
